text: Au gu hagalongo gi nia lee o digau dogologo ala e helekai boloo, “Di hagamadagudagu dangada gu hagahonu i nia madagoaa huogodoo! Gidaadou ga hagahuaidu mo di hagi aga a mee gi digau aamua.” Ogu ihoo hagaaloho hogi e tali au bolo au gii doo gi lala, e helekai boloo, “Holongo gimaadou e mee hua di hai di madau halahalau a mee, gii kumi a mee gaa hai a mee hagahuaidu.”
